item.title: Comment on The polity and culture that is Oregon by Thanatos Savehn
item.description:
Reply to This is not UBI:

This is basically a Oregon citizen dividend, somewhat on the lines of the Alaska Permanent Fund. A program that has existed for 5 decades, without causing any of the problems some have pointed out here.

Extracting oil and gas from public lands may not have the same effects as extracting rents from local businesses.
